{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.17236v1", "title": "Rate-Distortion-Perception Theory for the Quadratic Wasserstein Space", "summary": "We establish a single-letter characterization of the fundamental
distortion-rate-perception tradeoff with limited common randomness under the
squared error distortion measure and the squared Wasserstein-2 perception
measure. Moreover, it is shown that this single-letter characterization can be
explicitly evaluated for the Gaussian source. Various notions of universal
representation are also clarified.", "main_category": "cs.IT", "categories": "cs.IT,cs.LG,math.IT", "published": "2025-04-24T04:13:56Z"}
